resources.string: Time-colored Union Jack flag for my mates.
Show Union Jack in proper royal colours only.

Union Jack Chronochrome™ combines time and color to create a dynamic Union Flag wallpaper. Chronochrome™ which is a term meaning Time-Color, was created as an experiment in synesthesia ― Can we become so accustomed to associating time with color that it becomes second nature? Instead of asking, "What time is it?", might we one day ask, "What color is it?"
 
 Union Jack Chronochrome™
